template_description: Standard template for service_architecture.json files based on UAF definitions
purpose: Processes matter and energy, supporting complex internal dynamics. Components: Stars, planets, moons, asteroids, comets.

interfaces.name: Stellar and Planetary Interaction
interfaces.description: Stellar and planetary systems are gravitationally bound collections of matter that exhibit complex dynamics, including orbital motion, energy transfer, and chemical evolution.
interfaces.source_verification: Existing - verified by authoritative sources. See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Planetary_system, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Star_system
